topic.title: Totally blown away how easy!
topic.body: I wonder if we will have an opportunity to test this while some major central servers are down.

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
let's load this shiznat up!
power to the people  
testing for the win!

1_1HRqipL1thbTsztjAvhN76qkzQBZ1k93nJ.body: how would you avoid using the pipes?

5_1CoVAt2jBzV4Na6nX3VG1JSfjS8fwse1Z9.body: One thing Snowden accomplished is he illustrated with clear evidence the vast divide between what the government / corporations tell us and what is really going on. To undercut an entire political and economic class is such a huge shift that it takes time to register. And now we've got citizens working from wildly different perspectives. We must inform the idiots!

1_1JgHfDK4eojCkVZHKey9hiMAcAc9mxMUK2.body: This zerotalk is going to be a major draw for people. How about some subs for this thing? Within English, perhaps some general topics to separate things. The main posting area is going to quickly be overrun with sheer quantity of posts. I'm truly astounded at the technology you guys have created. Thank you.
